#Join the IVEF development

We are always looking for new people to help us with the development of the IVEF standard. You can participate on various levels:

  * [http://code.google.com/p/ivef-sdk/issues/entry Tell] us your needs, so we know what to put in the interface for our common [goal]
  * Develop documentation or code
  * Test the [http://code.google.com/p/ivef-sdk/downloads/list SDK] on various platforms 
  * ....

See [http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/HowToJoinAProject] for more information
